description: Redevelopment in outline to provide a five-storey plus basement building for B1 purposes of up to 2287 sq.m. gross (excluding atrium) with additional rooftop plant.
decision_conditions: The undermentioned item(s) (i) (ii) (iii) (iv) of detail(s) of the development from the list below shall be submitted to and approved by the Council prior to the commencement of this development: (i) Precise siting. (ii) The detailed design of the building(s). (iii) The external appearance of the building(s) (including materials to be used, their texture and colour). (iv) Precise details of the means of vehicular access to the site including corner splays, kerb radii and sight lines. (v) Details of landscaping and other treatment and layout of any part of the site not covered by buildings (including full details of existing trees to be retained or removed and the number, type and position of any new trees, shrubs or bushes to be planted). (vi) Details of boundary treatment.
